    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtasysUDPServer

        public ExtasysUDPServer(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                int corePoolSize,
                int maximumPoolSize)
        Constructs a new Extasys UDP Server.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the server.
        description - is the description of the server.
        corePoolSize - is the number of threads to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.
        maximumPoolSize - is the maximum number of threads to allow in the pool.

    • Method Detail

      • AddListener

        public UDPListener AddListener(java.lang.String name,
                      java.net.InetAddress ipAddress,
                      int port,
                      int readBufferSize,
                      int readDataTimeOut)
        Add a new listener to this server.
        Parameters:
        name - is the listener's name.
        ipAddress - is the listener's IP address.
        port - is the listener's udp port.
        readBufferSize - is the maximum size of bytes the listener can use to read incoming bytes at a time.
        readDataTimeOut - is the maximum time in milliseconds a client can use to send data to the listener.
        Returns:
        the listener.

      • RemoveListener

        public void RemoveListener(java.lang.String name)
        Stops and removes a UDP listener from this server.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the UDP listener.

      • SendData

        public void SendData(java.net.DatagramPacket packet)
        Send data. This method sends the data from all listeners.
        Parameters:
        packet - is the DatagramPacket to send.

      • Start

        public void Start()
           throws java.net.SocketException
        Start or restart the server.
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException

      • Stop

        public void Stop()
        Stop the server.

      • Dispose

        public void Dispose()
        Dispose the server. This method stops the server and disposes all the active members of this class. After calling this method you cannot re-start the server.

      • OnDataReceive

        public void OnDataReceive(UDPListener listener,
                 java.net.DatagramPacket packet)

        Returns the description of this server.

        the description of this server.

      • getListeners

        public java.util.ArrayList getListeners()
        Returns an ArrayList with this server's tcp listeners. The ArrayList elements are UDPListener classes.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with this server's udp listeners.

      • getMyThreadPool

        public java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor getMyThreadPool()
        Returns this server's thread pool.
        Returns:
        this server's thread pool.
